title: What are some drawbacks of PSU jobs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tranferable to any part of India. So if wife is employed, living together is an issue. Kids also may stay away if u are not the mother. Timely promotions are not guaranteed even if u are hardworking. No much scope of expecting financial growth beyond what company provides. Life become monotonous and stereotype if u dont take any personal interest in something. Stable life, happy life if your wife is housewife and your expense profile is moderate.
